info.title: Wii VC Launch
info.author: Lynx64
info.description: Plugin for launching Wii VC titles
info.details:
Wii U plugin to enhance launching Wii VC titles and Wii Mode.
FEATURES:
Custom dialogs:
- Select a display option (TV Only, TV and GamePad, etc.) with any controller.
- Autolaunch into a specific display option bypassing all dialogs.
  - Keep A pressed when launching a game to force open the Select a display option dialogs.
  - Falls back to the GamePad screen if TV not connected.

Original built in dialogs:
- Enables the GamePad sensor bar for built in dialogs.
- Allow using a Pro Controller to Select a display option in the built in dialogs.

Video:
- Set the resolution to 480p, 720p, 480i, or 576i (including 4:3 variants).
  - Can be set separately for Wii VC and Wii Mode.

USAGE:
After installing you need to restart the console for it to be loaded & appear in the plugin menu.
Open the plugin config menu by pressing L, DPAD Down and Minus on the GamePad, Pro Controller or Classic Controller, or B, DPAD Down and Minus on a Wii Remote.

Press B on any controller to back out of the custom dialogs.

If custom dialogs are disabled:
- Autolaunch cannot be used
- Set resolution can still be used

"Preserve SYSCONF on Wii VC title launch" and "Permanent Wii Internet Settings" (Disables Wii Internet Connection Settings overwrite) are useful in combination with Priiloader or Wii homebrew that can change the Internet Connection settings. If you don't have Priiloader installed you don't need to worry about them and can leave them both on false.

changelog:
1.5
Fix a crash when starting Wii VC with Preserve SYSCONF enabled that was introduced in the last version.
Retry restoring SYSCONF incase of failure.

1.4

Patch out the forced switch to 576i when using a component cable on a PAL console ( #11 ).
Build with the latest libraries.

PRs:
Component patch by @Andrew1Hawes in #13

1.3

Bug fixes:
Fix SYSCONF Preserver not functioning on some setups.
Custom dialogs would not appear / autolaunch would not configure correctly after:
Opening certain applets on the menu.
Launching a non-Wii title which then got cancelled after a certain point.

1.2

You can now back out of the custom dialogs and abort launching by pressing B on any controller.
Rename text "Refresh" to "Detect TV".

1.1

Fix Permanent Wii Internet Settings softlock (Wii U gets softlocked at the launch of the vWii when enabling "Permanent Wii Internet Settings").

1.0

Add resolutions 1080i and 1080p.
Preserve SYSCONF on Wii VC title launch. Enabled by default. Useful in combination with Priiloader hacks.
Permanent Wii Internet Settings / Disable Wii Internet Settings overwrite. Off by default. Useful in combination with Priiloader hacks.
PRs:

SYSCONF Preserver by @Andrew1Hawes in #7

0.6

Allow using a Pro Controller to Select a display option in the built in dialogs.
Display a notification when the GamePad sensor bar gets enabled (will only show if the sensor bar wasn't already enabled and if the GamePad is connected).
Display a notification when autolaunching.
Also set Wii Mode resolution when jumping straight to Wii Data Management.
Override .wuhb vWii forwarder display mode (if you have the GamePad Auto Standby plugin installed please also update it so it doesn't interfere).
Bug fix 122e572 .

0.5

Requires Aroma Beta-17 (2024-05-06) or newer (specifically PluginBackend version 0.3.0 or newer).

Update to WUPS 0.8.1.
Setting the resolution is no longer restricted to HDMI only.
Add resolutions 480i and 576i (including 4:3 variants) (non-HDMI only).
Setting the Wii Menu resolution is now a separate setting.
(Your existing resolution setting will be copied over.)
Bug fixes.

0.4

Add resolution option for 480p 4:3.
Don't show TV options if TV not connected (HDMI only).
Only update recent order if recent is selected in settings.
